name: lint-check
description: Run ESLint to check code quality
instructions:
Runs ESLint to check for code quality issues, potential bugs, and style violations.

What it checks:
- TypeScript type safety
- React best practices and hooks rules
- Unused variables and imports
- Code style consistency

Output:
- Lists all warnings and errors
- Shows file locations and line numbers
- Suggests fixes where applicable

To auto-fix issues:
- Run: npm run lint -- --fix

Common issues:
- Unused imports (safe to remove)
- Missing dependencies in useEffect/useMemo
- React key props on list items
